data.title: MLB spring training 2024 maps: Where every team is playing in Florida and Arizona
data.meta_description: Fifteen teams play in the Grapefruit League (Florida) and the other 15 in the Cactus League (Arizona).
data.text:
Major League Baseball's 2024 spring training is underway with teams assembling in Florida and Arizona to prepare for the new season.

Fifteen teams play in the Grapefruit League (Florida) and the other 15 in the Cactus League (Arizona). Sites in Florida are scattered across the state while camps in Arizona are all in the Phoenix metropolitan area.

SPRING TRAINING Here's how far your favorite teams travel to camp

Here's a look at where all 30 teams are playing in February and March:

Florida spring training map: MLB Grapefruit League

(map via MLB.com)

Atlanta Braves – North Port

Baltimore Orioles – Sarasota

Boston Red Sox – Fort Myers

Detroit Tigers – Lakeland

Houston Astros – West Palm Beach

Miami Marlins – Jupiter

Minnesota Twins – Fort Myers

New York Mets – Port St. Lucie

New York Yankees – Tampa

Philadelphia Phillies – Clearwater

Pittsburgh Pirates – Bradenton

St. Louis Cardinals – Jupiter

Tampa Bay Rays – Port Charlotte

Toronto Blue Jays – Dunedin

Washington Nationals – West Palm Beach

Arizona spring training map: MLB Cactus League

(map via MLB.com)
